15-6-38 To Raise the Palate or Tongue.Mrs Kelly ,Quin says in her young days there was an old woman in Newmarket on Fergus who used to raise the palate.She used put the patient sitting on the floor .Then she caught the crown of the head in a firm grip and pulled the hair suddenly upwards and immediately the palate fell into its proper place.
